title: As a user I want download all documents with 1 click from the provisional
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged into WBC
AND viewing the Provisional Roster

Wireframe:https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on the paperclip icon
custom_expected:
THEN all documents for that player will be downloaded (It previously downloaded All docs minus the PPA)
AND the "Other Docs" column header will be renamed to "All Docs"

title: As a User, I want to see if a Player's Report contains certain details while looking at the Game Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is viewing the Club Communication page


Game Report: https://zpl.io/beOkn4P
custom_expected:
THEN The following three columns will appear on all Game Reports:=
- Box Score
- Comments
- Side Work
AND if a player’s player report for that game contains a Box Score (with stats) a check mark will appear in the Box Score column
AND if a player’s player report has text entered into any of the following Comments boxes, a check mark will appear in the Comments column:
- Comments
- Offensive
- Defensive
- Results & Comments
AND if a player’s player report has any of the following side work boxes checked, a check mark will appear in the Side Work column:
- Weight Work
- Warm-Ups
- Conditioning
- Other Activities

title: As a User, I want to view a DNP Player's Player Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing the Club Communications page
custom_steps: WHEN launching a Player Report modal
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a position dropdown
AND the version of the player report displayed will be dictated by the position dropdown
AND Values include:
- SP
- RP
- 1B
- 2B
- 3B
- SS
- LF
- CF
- RF
- INF
- OF
- DNP

AND changing the position dropdown to DNP will load the DNP version of the player report modal
ANDc licking Save All will save and dismiss the modal
AND clicking Cancel All will discard changes and dismiss the modal
AND when the modal is saved with all required fields completed, the checkmark in the Report column of the game report will turn green, as depicted in the wire

title: As a User, I want to view a Position Player's Player Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is viewing the a Game Report
AND all affiliated player’s names will be a hyperlink


Game Report: https://zpl.io/beOkn4P
Player Report: https://zpl.io/aBdWqGO
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the name of a affiliated position player
custom_expected:
THEN a modal displaying the position players version of the player report will launch
AND clicking Save All will save and dismiss the modal
AND clicking Cancel All will discard changes and dismiss the modal
AND when the modal is saved with all required fields completed, the checkmark in the Report column of the game report will turn green, as depicted in the wire

title: As a User, I want to specify a Player's Primary and Secondary Languages
custom_steps:
In the Bio Info section of a player’s profile, there will be two new fields:

Primary Language

Secondary Language

These fields will not be required and will be Select2 Dropdowns

Values in both these dropdowns will be:

English

Spanish

German

Dutch

Papiamento

Czech

French

Urdu

Portugese

Filipino

Chinese

Italian

Japanese

title: As a user I want to view a position key
custom_steps:
Wireframes:

Position Key: https://zpl.io/aXmq6nX

Profile: https://zpl.io/brMyMMe

Interest List: https://zpl.io/a3j5Oyy

 

AC:

An i icon will appear next to the column header on the interest list

An i icon will appear next to the position label on the profile

Clicking on the icon will launch a position key modal

title: As a User, I want to view a Box Score on a Pitcher's Player Report
custom_steps:
Wire:  https://zpl.io/bWmJZkM

AC:

When a game report is generated by BAM stats, there will be box score data available for that game

When opening a pitchers’s player report for a finalized game, there will be a box score displayed at the top of the modal

The box score layout will match the provided wire

The box score will be populated with the data from the game

title: As a User, I want to view a Catcher's Player Report
custom_steps:
Wire:  https://zpl.io/aN58r9D

 

AC:

When viewing a game report, all affiliated player’s names will be a hyperlink

Clicking the name of a affiliated catcher will launch a modal displaying the catcher version of the player report

The modal will match the provided wire

Clicking Save All will save and dismiss the modal

Clicking Cancel All will discard changes and dismiss the modal

When the modal is saved with all required fields completed, the checkmark in the Report column of the game report will turn green, as depicted in the wire

Note: Box scores will be handled in later stories
